user.title: Set up MeteoLux Weather
user.description: MeteoLux provides accurate weather forecasts for Luxembourg. Choose how you want to specify your location:

data_description.location_method:
Select how you want to specify your location:
• City list: Choose from 102 Luxembourg cities
• Address: Enter a Luxembourg address (will be geocoded)
• Map: Pick a point on the map

city.title: Select City from List
city.description: Select your city from the dropdown list. The list includes all 102 Luxembourg locations available through the MeteoLux API.

data_description.name: A friendly name for this location (e.g., 'Home', 'Office', 'Luxembourg City')
data_description.city: Select your city from the dropdown list. Type to search.

address.title: Enter Luxembourg Address
address.description: Enter a Luxembourg address which will be converted to precise coordinates using OpenStreetMap. Example: {example}

data_description.name: A friendly name for this location (e.g., 'Home', 'Office')
data_description.address: Full Luxembourg address including street number, street name, and city

address_confirm.title: Confirm Geocoded Location

map.title: Select Location on Map
map.description: Click on the map to select your precise location in Luxembourg. You can zoom and pan to find your exact location.

data_description.name: A friendly name for this location (e.g., 'Home', 'Office')
data_description.location: Click on the map to set your location. The map is centered on Luxembourg City by default.

language.title: Weather Forecast Configuration
language.description: Configure language and update intervals for weather forecasts. Language affects how weather conditions are displayed. Update intervals control how often weather data is refreshed.

data_description.language: Choose from English, French (Français), German (Deutsch), or Luxembourgish (Lëtzebuergesch)
data_description.update_interval_current: How often to update current weather conditions (1-60 minutes). Lower values provide more up-to-date data but increase API requests. Default: 10 minutes.
data_description.update_interval_hourly: How often to update hourly forecasts (5-120 minutes). Hourly forecasts typically don't change as frequently. Default: 30 minutes.
data_description.update_interval_daily: How often to update daily forecasts (1-24 hours). Daily forecasts are stable and don't need frequent updates. Default: 6 hours.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure: {name}
reconfigure.description: Choose what you want to reconfigure for this location. Changes will be applied immediately and the integration will reload.

data_description.reconfigure_type:
Select what you want to change:
• Location: Change city, address, or map coordinates
• Name: Change the location name (optionally regenerate entity IDs)
• Weather Settings: Change language and update intervals

reconfigure_location.title: Change Location Method
reconfigure_location.description: Select the new location method. You can switch between city selector, address input, or map selection.

data_description.location_method: Choose how you want to specify the new location

reconfigure_city.title: Change City
reconfigure_city.description: Select a new city from the list of 102 Luxembourg locations.

data_description.city: Type to search for your city

reconfigure_address.title: Change Address
reconfigure_address.description: Enter a new Luxembourg address. It will be automatically geocoded to coordinates. Example: {example}

data_description.address: Full Luxembourg address including street and city

reconfigure_map.title: Change Map Location
reconfigure_map.description: Click on the map to select a new location. The map shows your current location as the default.

data_description.location: Click on the map to set the new location

reconfigure_name.title: Change Name
reconfigure_name.description: Update the location name. Optionally regenerate entity IDs to match the new name.

data_description.name: New friendly name for this location (e.g., 'Home', 'Office')
data_description.regenerate_entity_ids: If enabled, entity IDs will be regenerated based on the new name. WARNING: This will break automations and dashboards that reference the old entity IDs. Leave unchecked to keep existing entity IDs.

reconfigure_forecast.title: Change Weather Forecast Settings
reconfigure_forecast.description: Update language and update intervals. Changes will be applied immediately after submission.

data_description.language: Choose from English, French (Français), German (Deutsch), or Luxembourgish (Lëtzebuergesch)
data_description.update_interval_current: How often to update current weather conditions (1-60 minutes). Default: 10 minutes.
data_description.update_interval_hourly: How often to update hourly forecasts (5-120 minutes). Default: 30 minutes.
data_description.update_interval_daily: How often to update daily forecasts (1-24 hours). Default: 6 hours.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to MeteoLux API. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.invalid_city: Invalid city selection. Please select a city from the dropdown list.
error.address_not_found: The address could not be found in Luxembourg. Please check the address format and try again. Example: '1 Rue de la Gare, Luxembourg'
error.location_outside_luxembourg: The selected location is outside Luxembourg boundaries. MeteoLux only provides weather data for locations within Luxembourg.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the Home Assistant logs for more details.

abort.already_configured: This location is already configured. Each location can only be added once. To add weather for a different location, use a different city or coordinates.
abort.reconfigure_successful: Configuration updated successfully. The integration will reload automatically to apply the new language and update interval settings.
